reviews.review_msg: Spent a lot of time on unnecessary calculus that wasn't used for midterms. Diagrams in class were very unclear and often times blurry. TA marking is super subjective. Best way to prepare is reading through his theory notes on canvas, rather than going to lectures. Midterm averages were around 30%
I love this guy because I got A+!

Horrible. His lectures and the assigned readings were not coordinated with the syllabus, and his final exam asked questions that covered concepts that were not very related to any of the material that he or the TA indicated to us that we needed to know. I read these reviews and decided to take the class anyway... really wish I hadn't.
